ChemicalPropertyIsActive Property

CDXML Name:ChemicalPropertyIsActive
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_ChemicalPropertyIsActive
CDX Constant Value:0x0BB2
Data Size:CDXBoolean
Property of objects:kCDXObj_ChemicalProperty
First written/read in:ChemDraw 9.0
Required?No

Description:

Whether the property should be recalculated in response to changes in the basis objects.

If this property is absent:

The Is Active state is treated as 'false', indicating that the display object should remain fixed and static even if the basis objects are modified.
